statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species='Tiger'
SELECT location, species FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date='2022-01-15'
SELECT observer_name, sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species='Elephant' ORDER BY sighting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location='Forest'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species = 'Tiger' ORDER BY sighting_date DESC;
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT observer_name, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sighting_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM wildlife_sightings ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT observer_name, sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species LIKE '%Lion%' ORDER BY sighting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings;
SELECT species_name, sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location_name = 'Jungle';
SELECT id, species_name, location_name, sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings ORDER BY sighting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_excursions WHERE guide_name = 'David Smith';
SELECT excursion_name, start_date, end_date FROM ecotourism_excursions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, species_name, location_name, sighting_date, observer_name FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sighting_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species_name, location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT guide_name, excursion_name, start_date, end_date FROM ecotourism_excursions WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT species_name, location_name, sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species_name = 'Tiger' OR location_name = 'Savannah';
SELECT observer_name, sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE observer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY sighting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT tourist_name, email, age FROM eco_tourists WHERE age > 30;
SELECT sighting_id, species_name, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species_name = 'Lion' AND location != 'Savannah';
SELECT researcher_name, research_date FROM research_data ORDER BY research_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
SELECT species_name, location, date_time FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT tourist_id, tourist_name, email, age FROM eco_tourists WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings INNER JOIN research_data ON wildlife_sightings.sighting_id = research_data.sighting_id WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tourist_name, email, phone_number FROM eco_tourists WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tourist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sightings;
SELECT species, location FROM sightings WHERE sighting_date = '2022-07-05';
SELECT common_name, scientific_name FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT observer_name, organization FROM observers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM sightings JOIN species ON sightings.species = species.species_id WHERE sightings.location = 'Forest'
SELECT common_name, scientific_name FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY scientific_name ASC
SELECT location_name, region FROM locations WHERE region = 'North America'
SELECT * FROM observers WHERE organization = 'Wildlife Conservation Society' AND contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT MAX(sighting_date) AS latest_sighting_date FROM sightings
SELECT * FROM sightings;
SELECT id, location, count FROM sightings WHERE count > 10;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, name FROM guides ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT date, location, guide_id FROM excursions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sightings WHERE count > 10 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, species, COUNT(*) FROM sightings GROUP BY location, species ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT s.id, s.date, s.location, r.name AS researcher_name FROM sightings s JOIN research_data rd ON s.id = rd.sighting_id JOIN researchers r ON r.id = rd.researcher_id;
SELECT g.name AS guide_name, COUNT(e.id) AS excursion_count FROM guides g LEFT JOIN excursions e ON g.id = e.guide_id GROUP BY g.name;
SELECT r.name AS researcher_name, COUNT(rd.sighting_id) AS total_sightings FROM researchers r LEFT JOIN research_data rd ON r.id = rd.researcher_id GROUP BY r.name ORDER BY total_sightings DESC;
